text: ready4 framework uses object-oriented programming (OOP) approach implement computational health economic models. One motivation using OOP concept “abstraction” - making things simple possible end-users ready4 modules exposing minimal amount code required implement method. However, users ready4 modules want “look hood” examine code implements module algorithms much detail. Reasons include : gain detailed insight methods implemented; test individual sub-components methods part code verification model validation checks; re-use sub-components existing methods authoring new methods. help facilitate achieving objectives, methods associated ready4 modules can de-composed functions can used independent ready4 modules. However, functions need documented easier comprehend adopt consistent house style (e.g. naming conventions). ready4fun provides workflow tools (classes, methods, functions datasets) achieve goals.
